message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.HC 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CV (Computer Vision) is the most likely category as the paper deals with analyzing and understanding visual data from 360{\deg} sports videos using deep learning techniques. 
2. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also likely as the paper proposes a deep learning-based agent for piloting through 360{\deg} sports videos automatically. 
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning) is relevant as the paper uses policy gradient technique to train the pipeline and learn an online policy of the agent from data. 
4. cs.MM (Multimedia) is relevant as the paper deals with analyzing and understanding multimedia data from 360{\deg} sports videos. 
5. cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is relevant as the paper aims to relieve the viewer from the task of continuously selecting a viewing angle, which is a human-computer interaction problem.
